sentences.en: As you look remorseful I will forgive you.
sentences.cn: 由于你显得很懊悔,所以我将原谅你.

sentences.en: Beating remorseful and loud the mutable sands of the sea - shore.
sentences.cn: 似懊悔着大声拍打海岸上善变的白沙.

sentences.en: Can't you let lad go just for this once? He is genuinely remorseful.
sentences.cn: 你就不能饶了这孩子吗?就这一次都不行 吗 ?他是真心悔悟了.

sentences.en: Can't you let the lad go for this once? He is genuinely remorseful.
sentences.cn: 你就不能饶了这孩子吗?就这一次都不行 吗 ?他是真悔悟了.

sentences.en: He represented to the court that the accused was very remorseful.
sentences.cn: 他代被告向法庭陈情说被告十分懊悔.
他真心实意地感到懊悔。

sentences.en: Memory, the punishment from god, makes depraved, makes you remorseful, makes you agonized.
sentences.cn: 记忆是上帝对人类的惩罚, 它让人堕落, 让人愧疚, 让人痛苦不堪.

sentences.en: When he realized the enormity of his crime, he became remorseful and penitent.
sentences.cn: 当他意识到的巨大他的罪行, 他悔恨和忏悔.

sentences.en: Xuan was remorseful, but he was too stubborn to admit he had been wrong.
sentences.cn: 宣很懊悔, 但是他又很顽固,不肯承认自己错了.

sentences.en: Yeobright was too deeply absorbed in the ramblings incidental to his remorseful state to notice her.
sentences.cn: 姚伯由于一意痛悔,只顾胡说乱道,所以就不顾得留神她的情形了.

trans.tran_en: If you are remorseful, you feel very guilty and sorry about something wrong that you have done
